CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Employee_Load_Complete__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Employee_Load_Complete__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Onboarding_Window_Close_Target__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Onboarding_Window_Close_Target__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Days Completed Early Prior
